channel.title: DNS on The NullCereal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in DNS on The NullCereal Blog

item.title: Going Phishing for CopyCats
item.description: If you’re in charge of a domain that others visit on a regular basis, and you want to ensure that users continue to trust that domain, then you want to keep phishers and attackers from creating fakes and copies of it.
